metadata.name: WAYPOINT
metadata.description:
"Waypoint" is a captivating piece of art that depicts two subjects in a colorful environment, sitting on the steps of a traditional gazebo called the Maloka. The Maloka is known for being a place of spiritual and cultural ceremonies, adding a sense of mystery and intrigue to the artwork. The central focus of the piece is the two subjects, with one subject showing her heart to the other, and the other pointing towards it.

The artwork explores the theme of following the heart and highlights the importance of listening to our innermost desires. The colors used in the piece are vivid and rich, bringing a sense of liveliness to the artwork and emphasizing the beauty of the environment. The contrasting positions of the subjects create an interesting visual dynamic, with one subject showing vulnerability and the other offering guidance. Overall, "Waypoint" is a thought-provoking and moving piece that encourages viewers to reflect on the role of the heart in our lives.
